Talon/??::


Talon was too weak to speak, and she was barely conceus. She b=
reathed heavely while a curious eyes watched at Tucson. One ofd them was a =
baby black dragon and the other a baby silver one; theit tiny heads poped u=
p from a side of their mother. They were confortable under one of Talon's w=
ings

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Sandra Panico <magicquartz@...> wrote:=

>
> It was time.  The females exit the cave and bow their heads to Tucson.=
  They look into the cave.  The old female nudges Tucson gently with her mu=
zzle, coaxing him to enter the cave.  Yet she reminds the silver and black =
dragon that it wasn't quite his place to enter the cave.  Not when Tucson w=
as about to meet his offspring for the first time.
> 
> " I'm sorry, but ru=
les are rules. You have to wait until they say you can enter the cave.  Now=
, excuse me, I have a child to attend to."
> 
> Slowly, with his head down,=
 Tucson enters the cave, as he pads his way over to Talon and smiles to her=
.  His eyes light up with joy, as he looks down upon his offspring for the =
first time.  
> 
> " We did it Talon, we brought a new life into the world.=
